mean_cn: v. 漂白，漂成，晒白；  n. 漂白剂
mean_en: to remove color or dirt and stains from (hair, clothing, etc.) especially through the effect of sunlight or by using chemicals :to make (something) whiter or lighter in color
sentence: My fur was bleached by the water. Now, I'm a polar bear.
sentence_trans: 我的毛被这种药剂给漂白了，伦家现在变成一只北极熊啦~
